text: General Thomas R. Morgan (born January 6, 1930) is a retired American military personnel. He was the Assistant Commandant of the United States Marine Corps from June 1986 until he retired on July 1, 1988 after completion of more than 36 years of active service. ==Awards and decorations== General Morgan's personal awards and decorations include: ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Pennsylvania
title: Thomas R. Morgan
